Posts.EditableText: Is there any way to change the background and text colors in the Quest editor? It's really painful on the eyes to stare at this black-on-white window for too long.
Posts.HTML: Is there any way to change the background and text colors in the Quest editor? It's really painful on the eyes to stare at this black-on-white window for too long.

Posts.EditableText:
Game - Display

An example: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/5jllte-m4e2e2whw4gf5jq/pokemon-type-harley-johto-and-sinnoh

Posts.EditableText: There may be something in the core code...
Posts.HTML: There may be something in the core code...

Posts.EditableText:
If you go into your screen/monitor settings and you click the high-contrast background. It'll actually turn Quest black and orange....MOSTLY. Scripts within scripts won't be affected but everything else will. Give it a try!

But I agree --- I wish there was a "night" setting.

Anonynn.
Posts.HTML:
